item.title: Building babiri.net
item.description: Prologue A Children’s Game In 2005, I received a copy of Pokémon Emerald for the Nintendo Game Boy. This would be my gateway to the Pokémon franchise, as I’d end up sinking countless hours into the series of games. I have fond memories challenging all the leaders at the Battle Frontier, capturing Shadow Lugia at Citadark Isle, hunting for secret base flags in The Underground, and many more through the years.
